category-def.name: francaplus.feature
category-def.label: Franca Plus DSL
category-def.description: This is the update site for the "Franca Plus DSL". The "Franca Plus Runtime" contains the requiered Franca Plus plugins, the SDK provides the sources. Some additional third party dependencies can be found in the "Third Party Feature".

category-def.name: architecture
category-def.label: Franca Plus Architecture Feature
category-def.description: Contains architectural Specifications also for CAN and SOMEIP deployment. Also there is a predefined Tag configuration provided.
